name: Endel
0:
”Alexa, start Endel”
”Alexa, ask Endel to play Focus”
”Alexa, launch Endel and play Sleep”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: endel
des:
Sleep, focus, and relax through the power of sound. Endel creates AI-powered sounds designed to support your everyday life. Backed by science, enjoyed by millions worldwide.

Endel is powered by its patented core AI technology. It takes inputs like location, environment, and natural light level to create the optimal functional soundscape, personalized on the fly. This allows Endel to reconnect your state with your circadian rhythm.

✨✨✨
Anything seems wrong with the skill? Get in touch, chances are we have a solution: ask@endel.io
✨✨✨

Endel's classic soundscapes are always there for you on Alexa:
• Sleep — soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sounds
• Relax — calms your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety.
• Focus — boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate for longer.
• Wind Down — prepare your mind and body for sleep with sounds to support your bedtime routine.

🔗🔗🔗
Endel subscription allows access to the ever-growing library of soundscapes, along with the convenience of smart soundscape suggestions, timers, and alarms.

Endel Soundscapes:
• Recovery — revives your wellbeing with sounds engineered to lower anxiety.
• Study — improves concentration and keeps you calm whilst studying or working. 
• Hibernation — nourishes your ears with cozy sounds for cold-season slumber.
• Rainy Outside — drips with the relaxing patter of rain and oceans, a form of naturally occurring pink noise known to aid sleep.

Endel x Artist Soundscapes: 
Endel works with innovative artists and thinkers to create original experiences. James Blake, Grimes, Miguel, Alan Watts, and Richie Hawtin aka Plastikman have all contributed to the catalog of soundscapes –– with more on the way. Available on Alexa:
• James Blake: Wind Down — original vocals and music by James Blake. Prepare your mind and body for bedtime.
• Grimes: AI Lullaby — original vocals and music by Grimes. Scientifically engineered for sleep.
• Alan Watts: Wiggly Wisdom — soothing and motivating spoken word soundscape. Infused with the playful wisdom of Alan Watts.
• Plastikman: Deeper Focus — a deep focus techno soundscape created with Richie Hawtin.

Cut away the distractions and improve your wellbeing with Endel!
